page.title: 07LOCAL HISTORY,SAUNDERSFOOT
page.content: Girls played hopscotch and spinning tops in their long skirts,covered by frilled white aprons. The land around the harbour was grassland and there were only 50-100 visitors who stayed in "apartments". These were rooms in private houses and the landlady cooked food provided by the guests. We got the impression from these elderly people that whilst they appreciated the improvement in the standard of living,there was an overall sadness that many of the old values seemed to have been lost.
